title: Content Strategist
description:
About SparkVibe Studio

SparkVibe Studio is a fresh, energetic startup dedicated to transforming how small businesses connect with their audiences through bold, authentic storytelling. Based in the vibrant city of Lisbon, we're building a creative hub that thrives on innovation and collaboration. Join us to shape our voice and make a lasting impact!

What You'll Do

  • Craft compelling content strategies that align with client brand identities and business goals.
  • Develop and manage content calendars for social media, blogs, and email campaigns.
  • Write engaging copy for websites, ads, and promotional materials that resonates with diverse audiences.
  • Analyze content performance using tools like Google Analytics and Hotjar to refine strategies.
  • Collaborate with graphic designers and videographers to create cohesive multimedia campaigns.
  • Stay ahead of content trends and propose innovative ideas to keep our clients competitive.

Who You Are

  • A creative thinker with 1-2 years of experience in content creation or marketing.
  • Skilled in writing clear, persuasive, and brand-aligned copy across multiple platforms.
  • Familiar with SEO principles and content management systems like WordPress or Webflow.
  • Comfortable using analytics tools to measure and optimize content performance.
  • A team player with strong communication skills and a passion for storytelling.

Nice-to-Haves

  • Experience with video scripting or basic video editing tools like Adobe Premiere.
  • Knowledge of Portuguese or another European language to engage local audiences.
  • Familiarity with paid ad platforms like Meta Ads or Google Ads.
  • A portfolio showcasing diverse content types (blogs, social posts, email campaigns).

Why Join Us?

  • Work in a creative, inclusive environment where your ideas are valued.
  • Enjoy a flexible hybrid schedule that balances office collaboration with remote freedom.
  • Access to professional growth opportunities, including workshops and industry events.
  • Be part of a small, tight-knit team with big ambitions to disrupt the content space.
  • Monthly team outings to explore Lisbon's culture, from fado nights to beach trips.

üìç Lisbon, Portugal ‚Ä¢ üíº Part-time ‚Ä¢ üè¢ Hybrid ‚Ä¢ üí∞ $1,000-1,500/month
requirements: 1-2 years of experience in content creation, marketing, or related field

title: Pay-Per-Click Specialist (PPC Specialist)
description:
üéØ Pay-Per-Click Specialist

Drive digital success through strategic PPC campaigns across Google, LinkedIn & Meta

About the Role

As a PPC Specialist, you'll be the central contact person for business partners, responsible for creating media plans and strategies, setting up, managing, optimizing, and maintaining paid search campaigns for Mekanism PPC India. You will ensure that campaigns are delivered on brief, tracking and tagging techniques are applied consistently using the agreed media plan and methodology, and insights are used to continuously improve and optimize results.

This role focuses on planning, executing, and optimizing paid advertising campaigns across multiple platforms ‚Äî primarily Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, and Meta Ads (Facebook & Instagram) ‚Äî to drive traffic, generate leads, and meet marketing goals.

Your Accountabilities

üéØ Core Responsibilities

  • Campaign Management: Plan, develop, and execute paid advertising campaigns across Google, LinkedIn, and Meta
  • Research & Targeting: Conduct keyword research, audience targeting, and write compelling ad copy
  • Performance Optimization: Manage budgets and optimize performance based on KPIs (CTR, ROAS, conversions, etc.)
  • Data Analysis: Analyze campaign data and deliver reports with clear, actionable insights
  • Industry Knowledge: Stay updated on trends and best practices in the paid advertising ecosystem
  • Client Relations: Serve as the central contact person for business partners
  • Strategy Development: Create comprehensive media plans and strategies
  • Tracking Implementation: Apply tracking and tagging techniques consistently

Who You Are

üë§ Ideal Candidate Profile

We're looking for a passionate digital marketing professional who thrives in a fast-paced agency environment. You should be a strategic thinker with a data-driven approach, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of delivering results through paid advertising campaigns.

  • Analytical Mindset: You love diving deep into data and turning insights into actionable strategies
  • Client-Focused: You excel at building relationships and communicating with business partners
  • Results-Driven: You're motivated by achieving KPIs and driving measurable business outcomes
  • Adaptable: You stay current with industry trends and quickly adapt to new platforms and tools
  • Team Player: You collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and share knowledge
  • Problem Solver: You approach challenges creatively and find innovative solutions

üåü What We Offer

üéÅ Benefits & Perks

  • Flexible Work Environment: Hybrid/Remote-first model in India
  • Continuous Development: Ongoing training & learning opportunities
  • Time Off: 24 paid leave days + 6 additional days after 5 years of service
  • Competitive Salary: Includes annual merit raises and performance bonuses
  • Health Coverage: Day-1 HMO benefits (up to 4 dependents included)
  • Insurance: Comprehensive life and accident insurance from Day 1
  • Retirement Package: Company-matched retirement benefits
  • IT Equipment: Provided from your first working day

üè∑Ô∏è Keywords

#GoogleAdsJobs ‚Ä¢ #MetaAdsSpecialist ‚Ä¢ #LinkedInAdsManager ‚Ä¢ #PPCIndia ‚Ä¢ #DigitalMarketingCareers ‚Ä¢ #MekanismPPC ‚Ä¢ #RemoteMarketingJobs ‚Ä¢ #PerformanceMarketing ‚Ä¢ #IndiaHiring ‚Ä¢ #MarketingOptimization

Ready to Optimize Digital Performance?

Join our team and drive success through strategic PPC campaigns.

Note: A full job description will be shared by our Talent Acquisition team upon selection.

title: SEO/SEM Specialist
description:
üöÄ SEO/SEM Specialist

Transform premium and luxury brands through data-driven digital performance

About Together Group

At Together Group, we are more than a digital partner ‚Äî we are transforming the way premium and luxury brands grow through global talent and technology. With operations across India, the Philippines, South Africa, Europe, and North America, our team brings together digital marketing, commerce, and creative strategy at scale.

We foster a collaborative, innovative, and fast-paced environment where team members are empowered with the latest tools, continuous learning opportunities, and a chance to work on cutting-edge projects for some of the world's most respected brands.

Your Mission

As an SEO/SEM Specialist, you'll execute data-driven strategies to enhance our business's paid and organic search performance across key digital platforms. You'll lead end-to-end management of paid media campaigns and work closely with cross-functional teams to increase traffic, improve conversion rates, and support broader marketing goals.

üéØ Key Responsibilities

  • Campaign Management: Plan, execute, and optimize paid campaigns across Google Ads, Meta, and other SEM platforms
  • Creative Excellence: Write engaging, high-performing ad copy and test multiple creatives to improve CTR and conversions
  • Performance Optimization: Track campaign performance, analyze data, and implement adjustments to meet KPIs
  • Budget Management: Manage budgets efficiently to maximize ROI and maintain cost-effectiveness
  • Advanced Targeting: Apply remarketing, audience segmentation, and geotargeting techniques
  • Research & Analysis: Conduct keyword research, competitor analysis, and market trend evaluation
  • SEO Implementation: Implement local SEO strategies and optimize landing page performance
  • Reporting: Prepare detailed performance reports analyzing impressions, CTR, CPC, conversions, and quality score

Who You Are

üíº Requirements

  • 2-4 years of experience in SEO/SEM and digital marketing
  • Proficiency in Google Ads, Google Analytics, and Meta Ads Manager
  • Strong analytical skills and data-driven decision making
  • Experience with keyword research tools and SEO platforms
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Ability to manage multiple campaigns and meet deadlines
  • Knowledge of current SEO/SEM trends and best practices
  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field

üåü Why Join Together Group?

üéÅ Benefits & Perks

  • Health Coverage: HMO, Dental, and Life Insurance for you and one free dependent starting day one
  • Paid Leaves: Birthday, Vacation, Medical, Maternity (up to 6 Vacation Leaves convertible to cash)
  • Company Culture: Year-End Parties, Family Day, Team Building, and more!
  • Global Exposure: Work with premium and luxury brands worldwide
  • Career Growth: Continuous learning opportunities and cutting-edge projects
  • Innovation: Access to the latest digital marketing tools and technologies

Ready to Shape the Future of Digital Performance?

Be part of a team where your voice matters, and your impact is visible.

Join us in transforming how premium brands grow through global talent and technology.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Senior Software Engineer

Join NeuralNet Dynamics and make a significant impact in our growing organization

About This Opportunity

We are looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our engineering team and help build scalable, high-performance systems. In this role, you will lead technical initiatives, mentor junior developers, and contribute to architectural decisions that will shape the future of our platform. You will work in a collaborative environment with opportunities to influence technology choices and engineering practices across the organization.

Key Responsibilities & Impact

  • Design and develop scalable software solutions using modern technologies and best practices
  • Lead technical initiatives and architectural discussions with the engineering team
  • Mentor junior and mid-level developers through code reviews, pair programming, and technical guidance
  • Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical solutions
  • Write comprehensive technical documentation and contribute to engineering standards and processes
  • Participate in on-call rotation and incident response procedures
  • Evaluate new technologies and tools to improve development efficiency and system performance
  • Contribute to hiring processes by conducting technical interviews and assessments

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent practical experience
  • 5+ years of professional software development experience with strong track record of delivering complex projects
  • Expert-level proficiency in at least one major programming language (Java, Python, Go, C#, etc.)
  • Deep understanding of software architecture patterns, design principles, and system design concepts
  • Extensive experience with databases (both SQL and NoSQL), caching strategies, and data modeling
  • Strong knowledge of web technologies, APIs, microservices architecture, and distributed systems
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
  • Proficiency with version control systems, CI/CD pipelines, and development workflow tools

Preferred Qualifications

  • Advanced degree in Computer Science or related technical field
  • Experience with machine learning, data science, or AI technologies
  • Knowledge of security best practices and compliance frameworks (SOC2, GDPR, etc.)
  • Experience with performance monitoring, observability tools, and site reliability engineering practices
  • Previous experience in high-growth startup or technology company environment
  • Open source contributions and active participation in technical communities

Comprehensive Benefits Package

  • Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance with 100% premium coverage for employees
  • Flexible unlimited PTO policy plus company-wide holidays and mental health days
  • Substantial professional development budget ($3,000+ annually) for courses, conferences, and certifications
  • Remote work flexibility with home office setup stipend and co-working space reimbursement
  • Competitive 401(k) retirement plan with generous company matching up to 6%
  • Stock options and equity participation in company growth and success
  • Parental leave policy with 12+ weeks paid time off for new parents
  • Wellness programs including gym membership, mental health support, and annual wellness stipend

Position Information

üìç Location: Chicago, IL

üíº Type: Internship

üè¢ Work Style: Hybrid

üéØ Level: Senior/Leadership

Ready to Make an Impact?

NeuralNet Dynamics is an equal opportunity employer committed to building a diverse and inclusive team.

Requirements: - Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent practical experience - 5+ years of professional software development experience with strong track record of delivering complex projects - Expert-level proficiency in at least one major programming language (Java, Python, Go, C#, etc.) - Deep understanding of software architecture patterns, design principles, and system design concepts - Extensive experience with databases (both SQL and NoSQL), caching strategies, and data modeling - Strong knowledge of web technologies, APIs, microservices architecture, and distributed systems - Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) - Proficiency with version control systems, CI/CD pipelines, and development workflow tools Benefits: - Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance with 100% premium coverage for employees - Flexible unlimited PTO policy plus company-wide holidays and mental health days - Substantial professional development budget ($3,000+ annually) for courses, conferences, and certifications - Remote work flexibility with home office setup stipend and co-working space reimbursement - Competitive 401(k) retirement plan with generous company matching up to 6% - Stock options and equity participation in company growth and success - Parental leave policy with 12+ weeks paid time off for new parents - Wellness programs including gym membership, mental health support, and annual wellness stipend
